name: Google Maps: Pokémon Challenge
summary: The Google Maps: Pokémon Challenge was a game launched by Google during April Fools' Day 2014. During the event, users of the Google Maps mobile application were given the ability to catch Pokémon scattered around the actual maps. Google's Pokédex consists of 25 Pokémon from each the first six generations, as well as Mew (which appeared and roamed after the user catches the other 150 Pokémon). The Pokédex includes all starter Pokémon, Eevee and all eight Eeveelutions, all seven final form pseudo-legendary Pokémon, and all electric rodents
